name: Supernatural Charm
summary: The elven magic in your blood manifests as a force you can use to become more appealing or alluring.
description:
The elven magic in your blood manifests as a force you can use to become more appealing or alluring. You can cast 1st-level charm as an arcane innate spell once per day.Traits

Half-Elf: A creature with this trait is part human and part elf. An ability with this trait can be used or selected only by half-elves.
